The reshuffling takes effect April 4.`` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade,'' Page said in a written statement. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader, and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.
